text: The AWS re/Start training program
helped Accenture address a shortage of skills that we were facing.
We were interested in hiring from the AWS re/Start program because
it is a fantastic source of entry level talent.
The program produces a really high quality candidate
that we were really excited to bring onboard.
Before joining the re/Start program I was working in a hotel
as a guest service officer.
After completeing the AWS re/Start program, I have joined Accenture
as a Senior Consulting Security Analyst.
Before joining the AWS re/Start program
I was working as a parking and compliance officer in local government.
I'm currently working as a System Analyst
and my job is to assist testing and development teams.
At Accenture we want to help them to further develop
that decision that they've made
and really help them grow those skills that they've already learnt.
Inclusion and diversity is a business imperative.
We want to be a successful and innovative company
and that means that we have to have people who have a wide range of backgrounds
and experiences so that we can provide the best solutions to our clients.
We always want our employees to feel at home at Accenture
and to really build their careers with us.
We see these graduates as our future leaders
and we want these graduates to come in and build their careers
and stay with us long term
and see a real future with us.
